Class ReplyHelper

extends java.lang.Object
    Helper for one reply.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReplyHelper

        public ReplyHelper(Reply replyPb)
        Constructs reply helper from Google protobuf. You should never need to create such object directly. This is managed by parent helper (see ReplySetHelper).
        Parameters:
        replyPb - [in] one protobuf reply.

    • Method Detail

      • getUri

        public java.lang.String getUri()
        Retrieves document URI.
        Returns:
        URI of the document.

      • getTitle

        public java.lang.String getTitle()
        Retrieves document title. Default formatter is used (see BasicTextFormatter), so matched words are simply highlighted.
        Returns:
        title of the document.

      • getTitle

        public java.lang.String getTitle(TextFormatter formatter)
        Retrieves document title.
        Parameters:
        formatter - [in] specific formatter used to managed highlighted words.
        Returns:
        formatted title of the document.

      • getAbstract

        public java.lang.String getAbstract()
        Retrieves document abstract. Default formatter is used (see BasicTextFormatter), so matched words are simply highlighted.
        Returns:
        abstract of the document
